subject: Reservation Cancellation
body:
Dear [Client's Name],

We hope this message finds you well. We're reaching out to confirm the cancellation of your reservation at [Resort Name]. We understand that circumstances can change, and we're here to support you throughout the process.

Cancelled Reservation Details:

Room: [Room Name]
Original Check-In Date: [Check-In Date]
Original Check-Out Date: [Check-Out Date]

If you have any questions regarding the cancellation or if there's anything else we can assist you with, please feel free to reach out to our reservations team at [Resort Contact Information]. We value your patronage and hope to have the opportunity to serve you in the future.

Thank you for considering [Resort Name], and we wish you all the best in your future plans.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Resort Name]
[Contact Information]
Email: [Email]
